name: Wombat - EOS Wallet & DApp Explorer
description: Wombat - EOS & Telos Wallet Wombat is leading and trusted wallet with free EOS and Telos accounts, free transactions and the best user experience. In other words: Wombat is fast, free, secure and easy to use.  Fast Wombat browser: Wombat wallet comes with a fast Web 3.0 browser which allows you to find, play and interact with the best blockchain applications (dApps) and games available on EOS and Telos. To make interactions with dApps as comfortable as possible you can whitelist any dApp you want for automatic signing of transactions. This feature save time and lets you focus on the dApp at hand. Of course, you can use the browser beyond Web 3.0 to just visit regular websites as well.  Non-custodial wallet With Wombat you can securely store, send and receive EOS- and Telos-based tokens. Your private key is stored directly on your device without any access by third parties. In case you lose your device Wombat offers a comfortable key backup and recovery option. Currently supported tokens include:   EOS token  Telos (TLOS) token  PGL Token  TKT token  Pixeos token   Best Games: With Wombat you have the best and most exceptional EOS and Telos games right at your fingertips. Playing blockchain games with Wombat comes with exclusive giveaways, free game-items and lots of opportunities to win gaming token. The most popular games supported by Wombat are:   EOS Dynasty (EOS Sanguo)  Prospectors  Crypto Sword & Magic  Blockchain Cuties Universe  ChainZ Arena  Upland  EOS Knights  Chain Clash  EOS Racing   If you have questions or want to give feedback, you can reach the Wombat team here:  Email: support@getwombat.io Telegram: https://t.me/getwombat Twitter: https://twitter.com/adoptwombat
